full_text:
However, I saw Amber Heard’s bruises. Something definitely happened. 

I think Johnny Depp can redeem himself, and I would have no problems with him starring in Fantastic Beasts if he was actively doung so

But he’s not. JK Rowling’s statement proved that

full_text: I know that #Depp is unseemly. I even had a hard time w/ him in Orient Express, but based their separation statement, Amber Heard shouldn't come out all that clean in this scenario either. Should DC/WB recast her? I thought they should have way back when, I wonder about now.

full_text: I never liked Johnny Depp's casting in 'Fantastic beasts' (I think he can't act) . I think what he did to Amber Heard is horrible. However I will still be seeing the next beasts movie as he isn't the only actor in the film, and they've done nothing wrong. #jkr
